code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Button,Card}from'antd';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{addMenu}from'../redux/slices/menu';import{PlusCircleOutlined}from'@ant-design/icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GlobalContainer=_ref=>{let{children,containerName,headerTitle,subtitle,navLInkTo,buttonTitle,state}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const navigate=useNavigate();const addMenuItem=()=>{let url='';const linkArr=navLInkTo.split('');if(linkArr[0]==='/'){linkArr.shift();}url=linkArr.join('');const data={id:url,url,name:buttonTitle};dispatch(addMenu(data));navigate(navLInkTo);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:containerName,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:headerTitle,extra:buttonTitle?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"primary",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlusCircleOutlined,{}),onClick:addMenuItem,children:buttonTitle}):null,children:children})});};export default GlobalContainer;
